name: Legend of Luigi
overview: It''s time to enter that strange but familiar land once again and discover the delights of Luigi's quest in the Dinosaur land to rescue Princess Toadstool from the evil grips of the nasty Bowser! in the legendary Legend of Luigi (SMW1 Hack) you must fight through the hordes of baddies to jump, swim and navigate the awesomely fun and tricky levels to save the princess from a fate worse than death!
